div.p: This value set expansion contains 4 concepts.

td.a: One meningococcal dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-99

tr.td: One meningococcal dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines") = TRUE
"Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines") = TRUE

td.a: Meningococcal booster dose was administered. The immunization schedule has been completed-120

tr.td: Meningococcal booster dose was administered. The immunization schedule has been completed

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines" AND "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 1

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccines for IMMZ.D18.S.Meningococcal.Polysaccharide vaccines schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Polysaccharide vaccines, 1-dose and booster dose schedule
